thread.title: KHDA humours Dubai students after heavy rain
thread.title_full: KHDA humours Dubai students after heavy rain

title: KHDA humours Dubai students after heavy rain
text: KHDA humours Dubai students after heavy rain Web Report /Dubai   | Last updated on February 27, 2017 at 02.00 pm Share Vote Schools' authority sees the funny side when students ask if schools are closed. Dubai's Knowledge and Human Development Authority (KHDA), the regulator of schools in the emirate, on Sunday received hundreds of inquiries from parents and students on whether schools will remain open on Monday.The KHDA, which went on an epic trolling spree, chose to respond to these queries in a unique way -- roasting the inquirers with GIFs.When one students wrote "I don't feel like swimming tomorrow though," the KHDA was quick to post a GIF of a cat bathing in a washbasin.For another student who said he didn't have an umbrella, the KHDA used a Minion-inspired GIF with an extendable umbrella arm.So if you are one of those who wanted to skip school and office but couldn't, scroll below and have fun.
